article.title: Status and history for [pnb]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: replaced all the occurrences of U+066C ٬ ARABIC THOUSANDS SEPARATOR by U+060C ، ARABIC COMMA.
stage 4: provided by Kumari Co Ltd via the Language Observatory.
stage 2: entered in the index, OHCHR identified as the source.
